articles.author: Barbara Starr, Ellie Kaufman and Jeremy Herb, CNN
articles.title: Top US general in Europe says there 'could be' an intelligence gap in US that caused US to overestimate Russia's capabilities - CNN
articles.description: The top US general in Europe said Tuesday there "could be" a gap in US intelligence gathering that caused the US to overestimate Russia's capability and underestimate Ukraine's defensive abilities before Russia attacked Ukraine.

articles.author: James Marson, Yaroslav Trofimov and Jared Malsin
articles.title: Ukraine Proposes Neutral Status With Guarantees, and Zelensky Seeks More Western Help - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Kyiv outlined its demands during cease-fire talks with Russia, seeking binding security guarantees from the U.S. and some European countries, while the five-week-old Russian war on Ukraine raged on around the country.
articles.content: Ukraine and Russia said they made some progress in talks to end the war, with Kyiv presenting its proposal for a neutral status and international security guarantees as Moscow continued deadly strike… [+308 chars]

articles.title: Explainer: Omicron 'stealth' COVID-19 variant BA.2 now dominant globally - CGTN
articles.description: A sub-variant of the highly transmissible Omicron version of coronavirus known as BA.2 is now dominant worldwide, prompting surges in many countries in Europe and Asia and raising concern over the potential for a new wave in the United States.
articles.content: A sub-variant of the highly transmissible Omicron version of coronavirus known as BA.2 is now dominant worldwide, prompting surges in many countries in Europe and Asia and raising concern over the po… [+2827 chars]

articles.author: Liam Morgan
articles.title: Erik ten Hag 'wants to bring Brazil winger Antony with him to Manchester United' - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Brazilian has caught the attention of several top European clubs following a string of impressive performances for Ajax, scoring 12 goals and making 10 assists in his 33 appearances this season.
articles.content:
Erik ten Hag wants to bring Ajax winger Antony with him to Manchester United if he is appointed manager at Old Trafford, according to reports.

articles.author: Paula Slier in Moscow
articles.title: WAR IN EUROPE: The West doesn't get it – Russians aren't 'zombified', and most of them are pro-Putin - Daily Maverick
articles.description: By far the majority of Russians, while heartbroken, believe Russia was forced into the war.
articles.content:
